faq-sabina-AR1boyR4.q: Does Sabina gain the attack bonus against Heroes who have played but not resolved an attack card?
faq-sabina-AR1boyR4.a: Yes: the card only checks for Heroes that **played** an attack card, regardless of whether they’ve resolved the action, which action they performed, and even whether this is still their card for the turn (it will “remember” whether they have played a card, even if it is discarded or switched for another card by an effect).
